attributes.action: Include the cost of road use and third party insurance in the tax on fuel.  Abolish Road Fund Licence, tolls and congestion charging.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increased cost would discourage road use.  Futher increases could be added to VAT so as not to increase burden on business.  Including third party insurance and Road Fund Licence would reduce court cases.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
